text:
I had to modify this line:
  if "%@eval[2+2]%" == "4" goto setup4NT
to add an extra %

Also had to use this code:
if not exist "%_JAVACMD%.exe" goto noJava


:noJava
Error: "%_JAVACMD%.exe" not found - check JAVA_HOME
goto end

instead of the code that concatenated those two lines after
the "if not exist" above.
creator: kenkyee@excite.com
patrick.luby@planamesa.com
text:
Attached are modified versions of ant.bat, antRun.bat, and lcp.bat that, I
believe, eliminates that 4NT problems. These scripts use environment variables
that all versions of the DOS shell can understand.

Please give them a try and see if they work. If they work, I will post a patch
for them.

Fixed in cvs head. Please test and report if everything works fine for you.
If it works ok, get back to this bug and close it please. I will then backport 
it to 1.5 branch for 1.5.1 release.

Thanks to Patrick Luby <patrick.luby@sun.com> for the script clean up and 
fixes.
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
